page.title: Richard Young
page.headline: UX/UI designer / front-end designer & developer
body: Hello! Welcome to my online portfolio, where you can see some examples of my design and development work.
I have been creating web-related content since 2004, including wireframing, UX, prototyping, design, development, and testing.
I am a huge fan of responsive design, accessibility, and clean, semantic markup, and have enjoyed working in a number of industries including e-commerce, finance, communications, and insurance.
Prior to my current career path, I worked as a composer and copywriter; both of which I found to be useful methodologies with regard to what I'm doing today.
Feel free to contact me or call on +44 (0)7967 639 192 if you would like to discuss working together.

body_01_categories.Design: Clean and elegant layouts, logo creation, interface design and image editing. Full access to Adobe CC.
body_01_categories.Development: Optimised, responsive, accessible and standards compliant HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
body_01_categories.UX / UI: User Experience / User Interface design, research and testing, from user-flow mapping, wireframing and prototyping.
body_01_categories.HTML Emails: For email marketing requirements; mobile friendly HTML email design and build, sending and reporting.
body_01_categories.WordPress: From scratch-built Wordpress sites and personal blogs, to custom templating and design.
body_01_categories.Content Creation: Effective copywriting and proofreading, taglines, marketing, branding and image sourcing.
